alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:51PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN BOTTINEAU AND NORTHERN ROLETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM CDT... At 1150 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of International Peace Garden, or 14 miles northeast of Bottineau, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... International Peace Garden around 1155 PM CDT. Dunseith around 1200 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. John, Belcourt and Rolla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
